__e: And she can't protect herself. Our first move will be tear gas and nonlethal weapons. But let me be clear.
Your hands registered as lethal weapons?
All that weapons tech in the hands of an hysterical four-year-old looking for his mummy and now there's an army of them.
And now, you're gonna die just like your friends.
They don't understand that death is for mortals... not for gods.
We are mortals all, extravagant in our weakness.
But it's because men are weak that they lie, even to themselves.
That is the mortal your father so extolls, is it not?
Still mad at me for defending the mortals who just saved your life?
